alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 10:08AM MST until November 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of light snow. Additional snow accumulations ranging anywhere from a dusting to 1 inch. Highest amounts are expected generally southeast of a line from Hill City to Leoti. * WHERE...Entire Tri-State area. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions associated with snow covered roadways. This includes the Interstate 70 corridor in eastern Colorado and northwest Kansas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Additional light snow accumulation is possible before precipitation ends from west to east this afternoon. With overcast skies and temperatures hovering in the upper teens to lower 20s, little if any melting is expected today. Winds will remain at or below 10 mph. Blowing and drifting snow are not anticipated. Wind chill readings as low as 5 degrees below zero are expected late this evening and early Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and exercise additional caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
